title: Brawler
tasks:
BRAWLER_C:1:Defeat a max level Cop
BRAWLER_G:1:Defeat a max level Gang
description: I am what I am. A fighter.

title: Notorious
tasks: FAMOUS:1:End a game with max reputation
description: The game is the game. Always.

title: Kingpin
tasks: KINGPIN:1:Win a season of Dopewars
description: In the boss's domain, every decision is a command, every order, law.

title: Fully Loaded
tasks: STUFFED:1:Max out equipment
description: If they bring a knife to the fight, we bring a gun

title: Luck
tasks:
BUY_LOW:20:Buy drugs at the lowest price (20)
SELL_HIGH:20:Sell drugs at the highest price (20)
description: Patience is profit.

title: Skill
tasks:
BUY_LOW:100:Buy drugs at the lowest price (100)
SELL_HIGH:100:Sell drugs at the highest price (100)
description: Buy when it's dirt cheap, sell when it's sky-high.

title: Habit
tasks:
BUY_LOW:250:Buy drugs at the lowest price (250)
SELL_HIGH:250:Sell drugs at the highest price( 250)
description: The market is a device for transferring money from the impatient to the patient.

title: Operator
tasks: VOLUME:69000000:Sell drugs for 69 Millions
description: Grind small, stack big.

title: Broker
tasks: VOLUME:420000000:Sell drugs for 420 Millions
description: Diversify your hustle.

title: Cartel
tasks: VOLUME:69000000000:Sell drugs for 69 Billions
description: Slow money beats no money.

title: Roller
tasks: HIGH_STAKES:5:Play 5 games with max stake multiplier
description: Vet every deal like it's a setup.

title: Staker
tasks: HIGH_STAKES:25:Play 25 games with max stake multiplier
description: Take what's yours fast.

title: Dicer
tasks: HIGH_STAKES:100:Play 100 games with max stake multiplier
description: Sober up, read the room, then bet on what's steady.

title: Receipts
tasks: PAPER:69000:Claim 69.000 $PAPER
description: Run numbers like it's a wiretap.

title: Funds
tasks: PAPER:420000:Claim 420.000 $PAPER
description: Stay liquid, stay free.

title: Nest Egg
tasks: PAPER:1000000:Claim 1.000.000 $PAPER
description: Follow the paper trail. Big players leave big clues.

title: Drip
tasks: GEAR_FROM:1:Play a game with a set of items from XXX
description: Always remind where you come from.

title: Survivor

description: Gear up right before you step to the table.

title: Tough
tasks: ENCOUNTER:100:Defeat 100 Cops or Gangs
description: Know your exit before you step in.

title: Dangerous

description: Solid cover's your best friend when bullets fly.

title: Infamous

title: Elegant

description: Charm's your blade, style's your shield.

title: Quick

description: Dress sharp, move cold.

title: Versatile

description: Drip don't shout, it whispers death.

title: Original Gangsta
